_comment_description: Students complete notes by filling in missing information from the reading passage.
_comment_use_case: Reading Passage 1/2/3, completing notes, summaries, or outlines
prompt:
Complete the notes below. Choose NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS from the passage for each answer.

Renewable Energy Sources:
• Solar: uses _____ to generate electricity
• Wind: requires _____ locations
• Hydro: depends on _____ flow

_field_descriptions.prompt: Note structure with blanks and word limit instruction
_field_descriptions.answer_key: Array of words/phrases from passage to complete notes

_validation_rules.answer_key: Array of exact words/phrases from the passage
_validation_rules.passage_verification: All answers must appear in the reading passage
